item.title: Js_of_ocaml in the VSCode OCaml Platform
item.description: For about two weeks now, the published version of the VSCode OCaml Platform extension has had something special about it. It is using Js_of_ocaml! This is the result of a month-long effort to switch the extension’s OCaml-to-JS compiler from BuckleScript to Js_of_ocaml. In this post, I will describe the extension, explain the reasoning for switching to Js_of_ocaml, and go over some of the things I learned through the porting experience.
